description:
Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing business grow. Using your influencing and relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users.

The Google Play Apps and Games Business Development team works closely with top apps and games developers worldwide on several strategic initiatives, including working on app quality, strategic product and business partnerships, global expansion, business growth etc. The Strategy and Operations team as part of the broader Business Development team works closely with apps and games leaders to support them in devising effective business and developer growth strategies, and manage business operations including tracking business initiatives, managing cross functional collaborations and building tools to measure progress against agreed goals.

As the North American Business Operations Manager, you will work closely with Games Business Development Managers and leaders to help them identify key trends in the gaming industry, performance of top games partners, data driven opportunity identification for future growth of the gaming business across several vectors like installs, engagement, custom game performance and business insights for games partners.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Natural Sciences, Engineering, or similar technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience using data and insights to drive business operations.
  • Ability to travel internationally as required.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in managing and maintaining data pipelines, and automating manual processes through workflows and parameters (e.g. PLX Workflows, App Script, Cider).
  • Experience with data visualization tools, including Dashboard design, creation and maintenance with the intention of surfacing insights at scale (e.g. DASNav, PLX Dashboards, Data Studio, Tableau).
  • Experience analyzing data and creating reports. Database query experience (e.g. SQL, Python, R languages).
  • Experience working with presentations tools, with the ability to translate data to relevant business insights and present them to an audience.
  • A passion for mobile apps and games and ability to work in a fast-paced and constantly evolving team environment.
  • Effective communication and presentation skills, comfortable engaging with technical and business stakeholders at all levels.
responsibilities:
• Work with cross functional representatives and leaders across the Games business to define and understand key games priorities.
  • Build and maintain dashboards to present key metrics, and quantify the impact of various programs and work with the business development team to design and create reports to be shared with key game developers.
  • Design, develop and maintain tools which provide analytical insights to the BD team to help them deliver insights to their developers, better relationships and enhance business impact.
  • Develop an understanding of the metrics and market dynamics within the apps and games industry in North America in order to help define regional strategies in terms of BD activity and resource planning, as well as some aspects of global planning.
  • Conduct deep-dive analysis on KPIs for large game developers to understand key drivers of their business and assess ways for Google Play to enhance their success.
title: Games Business Operations Manager, Google Play
